records.notes: Interior of a Tsawwassen bound TransLink Route 620 articulated bus.
A Nanaimo bound TransLink Route 7 trolleybus was seen at Nanaimo St & E Broadway in Grandview-Woodlands.
A Downtown Vancouver bound TransLink Route 4 trolleybus was seen at Blanca St & W 6th Ave near the University of British Columbia campus.
A Downtown Vancouver bound TransLink Route 14 trolleybus was seen at University Blvd & Wesbrook Mall on the University of British Columbia campus.
